rukus.text: Inna Al-Ladhina Kafaru Yunadawna Lamaqtu Allahi 'Akbaru Min Maqtikum 'Anfusakum 'Idh Tud`awna 'Ila Al-'Imani Fatakfuruna
Qalu Rabbana 'Amattana Athnatayni Wa 'Ahyaytana Athnatayni Fa`tarafna Bidhunubina Fahal 'Ila Khurujin Min Sabilin
Dhalikum Bi'annahu 'Idha Du`iya Allahu Wahdahu Kafartum Wa 'In Yushrak Bihi Tu'uminu Falhukmu Lillahi Al-`Aliyi Al-Kabiri
Huwa Al-Ladhi Yurikum 'Ayatihi Wa Yunazzilu Lakum Mina As-Sama'i Rizqaan Wa Ma Yatadhakkaru 'Illa Man Yunibu
Fad`u Allaha Mukhlisina Lahu Ad-Dina Wa Law Kariha Al-Kafiruna
Rafi`u Ad-Darajati Dhu Al-`Arshi Yulqi Ar-Ruha Min 'Amrihi `Ala Man Yasha'u Min `Ibadihi Liyundhira Yawma At-Talaqi
Yawma Hum Barizuna La Yakhfa `Ala Allahi Minhum Shay'un Limani Al-Mulku Al-Yawma Lillahi Al-Wahidi Al-Qahhari
Al-Yawma Tujza Kullu Nafsin Bima Kasabat La Zulma Al-Yawma 'Inna Allaha Sari`u Al-Hisabi
Wa 'Andhirhum Yawma Al-'Azifati 'Idhi Al-Qulubu Lada Al-Hanajiri Kazimina Ma Lilzzalimina Min Hamimin Wa La Shafi`in Yuta`u
Ya`lamu Kha'inata Al-'A`yuni Wa Ma Tukhfi As-Suduru
Wa Allahu Yaqđi Bil-Haqqi Wa Al-Ladhina Yad`una Min Dunihi La Yaqđuna Bishay'in 'Inna Allaha Huwa As-Sami`u Al-Basiru
